The program works Rather well. Its Awesome!

Guys, as with most cracked software, it's very important to disconnect your computer from the internet BEFORE you install it. Most software automatically checks their servers for updates and at the same time can detect fake CD keys and lock the program.

So disconnect your computer from the internet, install the software as per the instructions on Notepad, then run the program still with the net disconnected and enter the Options/Preferences menu and disable all automatic updates, all settings that send "anonymous data to improve our services" etc. and THEN plug your internet back in.

Hope this helps some people.

Cheers
